mata meyala karana kisi deyakata erehi wennath baha.panala yannath baha.ithin eyalage thiranawa walata wirudda wuneth mokakin mokak weyida kiyanna ba.mata karanna puluwan me minissu yana thanakata yanna witharayi.adhika wegayen giyapu wahanaya tika tika huru nathi nagarayakata athul wuna.tika welawakin wegaya adu wenawath ekka wenath mawathakata harawana gaman ee aa gamana nathara wuna.owunge ana kirimath ekka mamath bassa.ee dakapu deyan mata mage as adahaganna bariwa giya.ethana hitapu siyalu denama ma diha balanawa ge mata theruna.man me mechchara durak kisima kathawak nathuwa ekka awilla thiyenne methanatada .aayemath as dekama pihadala ethana thibunu sudu pata lallaka nil pata akurin liyala thiyena ee loku bord eeka ayeth kiyewuwa.
